channel.title: Crash at the beginning of Surface Tension
channel.description: As I go through the tunnel to start Surface Tension, the game crashes 100% of the time. I've had to forsake my only save file and start over from Questionable Ethics. Edit: Even restarting doesn't fix the problem. I can't get past Surface Tension at all. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T13_16_39C0.mdmp (107 KB)

item.title: Crash at the beginning of Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: FlotsamX
item.description:
As I go through the tunnel to start Surface Tension, the game crashes 100% of the time. I’ve had to forsake my only save file and start over from Questionable Ethics.

Edit: Even restarting doesn’t fix the problem. I can’t get past Surface Tension at all.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T13_16_39C0.mdmp (107 KB)

Read full topic
item.source: Crash at the beginning of Surface Tension
